medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Daruma and Two Landscapes (right landscape; one of a triptych)
description: seaside village at L, with white buildings, ships, and reeds at LL; sailboat with human figures at LLQ; low, rocky shore, buildings on stilts, and moored boats in middle ground at L; low mountains and a bay with boats in middle distance; at LR, an old lady in white ascends mountain trail at base; towering rock walls at either side of cliff, gnarled pine tree at L of cliff; small structure at center of mountain trail; second large cliff has temple complex at top; large, shadowy mountain continues upward at R
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
